title: Requirements Gathering
description: Understand and document the project requirements, including functional specifications, user stories, and non-functional requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop the high-level architecture for the neural interface and gaming system, including software components, interfaces, and data flow.

title: Frontend Development - Neural Interface
description: Develop the frontend interface for the neural component of the system, ensuring compatibility with EEG hardware and software.

title: Backend Development - Gaming System
description: Develop the backend services for the gaming system, including game management, connectivity with the neural interface, and integration with EEG hardware.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user data, game history, and neural interface interaction data.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Test the integration between frontend, backend, and EEG hardware. Conduct user acceptance testing to ensure a seamless experience.

title: DevOps Configuration and Deployment
description: Configure the development, staging, and production environments for the InterfazNeuralJuego system.

title: Documentation and Technical Writing
description: Write clear and concise documentation for developers, users, and administrators of the InterfazNeuralJuego system.
